org.mini2Dx.core.collision

Interface CollisionArea

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CollisionObject, Interpolatable, Positionable, Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionBox, CollisionCircle, CollisionPolygon, QuadTreeAwareCollisionBox, QuadTreeAwareCollisionCircle, QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon

    public interface CollisionArea
extends CollisionObject, Sizeable
    Common interface for collidable areas in-game
